item.minecraft.wooden_pickaxe.tooltip.su: Insert _Vanilla tools_ into the _crafting grid_ to _convert_ them to _SGear_ tools. Vanilla tools are _downgraded_ to _one durability_, so _convert_ them to _SGear_ to actually _make use_ of them.
item.minecraft.wooden_pickaxe.tooltip.be: Instantly breaks, convert to SGear to prevent.
